Nikki has helped thousands of women eliminate period problems through her educational masterclasses, courses & natural period products & has witnessed the life changing rewards in health, happiness, career and relationships when you’re in a state of hormonal bliss.

settings.title: No mood swings, cramps,  headaches, nothing!

settings.title: I JUST GOT MY PERIOD!!!
settings.text:
I was on the pill for 10 YEARS and only came off it a month and 5 days ago!!! 😲

I was expecting a year's wait before anything would happen as I've only been doing My Moonbox for 2 and a half months.

I'm at a loss... THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU, NIKKI!

I was literally sitting on the toilet, crying with glee!

Oh, and did I mention there were minimal pms symptoms and no pain?

Nikki gives you guidance every step of the way.

Absolutely flabbergasted! Get on it, girls!

settings.title: Pre moonbox I suffered from debilitating periods and PMDD
settings.text:
You name the symptom, I had it. Severe mood swings and anxiety, breast tenderness, cramps, nausea/vomiting, clots, the list was extensive. The only normal thing about them was their regularity.

So I tried moonbox. And 80% of my symptoms have disappeared, and I’m not as diligent as I could be. I have learnt so much about listening to my body and what it needs, and moonbox provides you with all the resources to support your new found understanding. The support is on-going and extensive. I am a new person, and my family and I are so thankful for moonbox. You won’t regret it.
settings.author: Rach Brenan

settings.title: Moonbox changed my life!!!
settings.text: It was through Moonbox and the education that they provide that I started considering getting off of birth control after being on it for 7 years. Not only that, but I realized that I had gut imbalances and was encouraged to see a naturopath. I ended up getting an autoimmune diagnosis and was able to catch things before it got too serious. Since coming off of Birth Control with all of the education and Moonbox products, and implementing all of the recommended shifts in my diet and lifestyle. I now have very little autoimmune symptoms and flareups, my periods are not extremely heavy like they used to be, and I have little to no PMS before my period. I am simply so grateful because it helped me realize imbalance in my body, through the teachings of how to listen to our bodies. Thank you, Nikki, I can't put words into the value that Moonbox carries and how much it has changed my life. I cannot recommend this enough!
settings.author: Emily Northrop

settings.title: This is the first time I haven't had to take painkillers during my  period in 8 years!!
settings.text: I received my first month of moon box two weeks before my period, I stuck to using the products everyday and I'm not kidding you, I did not have any cramps or my usual chronic bloating what so ever, I didn't feel the urge to stuff my face with comfort food and I felt so much more energized. I was also as strict as I could be not eating processed foods, refined sugar, oily food and I'm vegan already so this made it allot easier. Thankyou!!
settings.author: Loren Claridge

settings.text: Who is The Better Period Method for?
settings.content:
The Better Period Method is for you if you’re wanting to discover a clear path to naturally balancing your hormones for better periods, balanced moods, more energy, enhanced vitality and more! 

If you feel disconnected from your body, confused by your hormones & suffer during your menstrual cycle The Better Period Method is for you.

settings.text: What will I learn?
settings.content:
You will learn: 

• The top myths about periods that hold women back 

• How to identify signs of a normal VS abnormal menstrual cycle 

• What causes common period problems such as period pain & PMS 

• How to balance your hormones by addressing the Hormonal Hierarchy Of Needs 

• How to regulate blood sugar & achieve adequate nutrient intake for optimal balance

• How to eat & make a hormone healthy meals for better periods 

• Nutritionist created recipes for balancing hormones 

• The most common mistakes women make that prevent better periods 

• You’ll be able to identify what areas in your health need specific focus for healing 

And so much more!

settings.text: What do I get access to after purchase?
settings.content:
For an affordable price of only $17 you get access to: 

• 3 x video classes with Nikki, founder of My Moonbox. 

• 1 x 100+ page The Better Period Method E-book 

• 1 x How to Eat For Your Cycle Recipe Ebook 

• 1 x Daily Cycle-Care Routine Checklist

• BONUS: Shopping lists, journal prompts & access to our private community 

Discounted from $197 for a limited time only. 

Ready to get everything you need to kickstart your journey to better menstrual health? This is life-changing stuff.

settings.text: Can I access it any time?
settings.content:
Yes! Once you sign up you get emailed immediate access to The Better Period Method video lessons,  e-books + additional bonuses. 

You also have life-time access, so you can refer to it any time you like.

settings.text: I’m short on time, how long does The Better Period Method go for?
settings.content:
The Better Period Method video series goes for a full 40 minutes over 3 x in-depth video lessons. The eBooks are over 100+ pages and are self paced. 

If you have any questions after watching the class, you can head over to our private facebook group and interact with the community & period experts for extra support!

settings.text: Does this Method promote a specific diet?
settings.content:
I don’t promote any dietary labels, restrictive eating or extremes. I introduce the foods that are supportive for your hormonal health, as well as discussing the foods that commonly contribute to hormonal imbalances and period symptoms. 

Nutrition is unique to every person and The Better Period Method invites an awareness as to what foods and way of eating works for your unique biochemistry and enables you to thrive. 

You’ll get access to a step by step Meal Creation Guide, along with recipes that can be adapted to your dietary needs. All recipes are gluten free, dairy free and sugar free, with vegan options.

settings.text: Does this cover my specific condition or symptom?
settings.content:
The essential knowledge and strategies in this course is going to benefit EVERY condition and symptom. 

How is that possible? 

Because every system in your body is connected, and all symptoms and conditions connected to your menstrual cycle (whether it’s PMS, period pain, PMDD, irregular periods, endometriosis, adenomyosis, PCOS, fibroids etc) are symptoms of an underlying imbalance. 

The Better Period Method covers the essential FOUNDATIONS of hormonal & menstrual health that apply to every body - regardless of your condition, symptom, or age. It’s these key steps that are required to set strong foundations for yourself to begin healing your cycle, before doing anything else!

settings.text: Is this method for me if I’m on hormonal birth control?
settings.content:
YES! If you’re on hormonal birth control it is critical for you to be actively supporting your body to help improve your health and protect your body against potential side effects. 

Implementing the nutrition and lifestyle strategies shared in The Better Period Method will benefit your health whilst on birth control, but also ease your transition off birth control in the future as you’ll have all the knowledge you need to support your hormones & rebalance naturally. 

Please note that you cannot balance your hormones whilst on birth control, as it works to do the opposite. However, you can support your body whilst on birth control to help improve your health as much as possible, and better understand your body and cycle.

settings.text: Who is the host of The Better Period Method?
settings.content: The Better Period Method is hosted by Nikki Gonda, nutritionist, period expert and founder of My Moonbox. With her company she is on mission to provide women with a natural approach to reclaiming hormonal health & transforming the way they experience their periods. Using her background in nutritional health science Nikki has helped thousands of women eliminate period problems through her signature Master Your Cycle Course & natural products and has witnessed the life changing rewards it offers for periods, fertility, overall health, careers and relationships.

settings.text: What’s the difference between this & Master Your Cycle Course?
settings.content:
The Better Period Method focuses on the first essential steps you need to take to better understand your hormones, your menstrual cycle and what is required to effectively support your body in rebalancing your hormones and eliminating unwanted symptoms. This Method covers the essential foundations & strategies that are crucial for beginning your healing journey.  

Master Your Cycle is my signature full course with 10 video sessions guiding you every step of the way to transforming your hormonal and menstrual health. The focus is on all factors impacting hormonal health, nutrition & lifestyle strategy and habit creation for lasting health.
